meanings.definition: The quality of being amusing or entertaining.
meanings.sent1: Her amusingness brightened up the party.
meanings.sent2: The amusingness of the movie made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: His amusingness in telling jokes always lightens the mood.
meanings.sent4: The amusingness of the situation was like a burst of confetti.
meanings.sent5: The amusingness of her stories was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The state of being funny or causing laughter.
meanings.sent1: The amusingness of the clown made the children giggle.
meanings.sent2: We couldn't contain our laughter at the amusingness of the situation.
meanings.sent3: The amusingness of the cat playing with a toy was adorable.
meanings.sent4: His amusingness was a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The amusingness of the comedy show was infectious.
